title: Savage eSports Looking for High Plat-Diamond subs
body:
We're currently seeking subs for practise and tournaments.

Must be High Plat (Plat 3 minimum, if you don't exceed this rank do NOT apply, thanks)

Please fill out the application;

IGN:
Age:
Rank:
Role: (Best to worst)
Do you own a working Mic?
Are you active, if so what days and times:
Why do you want to join?

Example:
IGN: Nestay
Rank: Diamond V
Role: Adc > Support > Jungle > Mid > Top
Do you have a working Mic? Yes
Are you active, if so what days: Monday - Friday 5pm-10pm GMT+8 (Perth)
Why do you want to join: I'm looking to sub for a serious team and gain some competitive experience, if the chance arises I would like to become the starting Mid laner for Savage eSports.

Thank you for your time.

replies.body:
IGN: XSirCution
Age: 18
Rank: Diamond 5 - 11 points
Role: Top > Mid > Support > ADC > Jungle
Do you own a working Mic? - Yes I do.
Am I active, if so what days? Monday - Saturday 5pm - 10pm GMT +11 (Melbourne)
Why do I want to join: I'm currently looking to join a serious team as a starting member but I think it would be best if i can practice with professionals first to improve my skill. Being in a team has always been my dream and it would be great if you could help me attain it. Although I'm not the best player there is, I can promise you that I will do everything I can to beat the best.

Thank You for your time,
-XSirCution

IGN: Reign in Blood
Age: 21
Rank: Plat II
Role: Support
Do you own a working Mic? Yes
Are you active, if so what days and times: On holidays atm, so whenever, generally evenings/nights pref over daytime
Why do you want to join? League is more fun when played as a team, solo queue is the worst
Why are you looking for high plat when you're only gold yourself.
I'm not a player, our roster is full of Diamond players.
Looking for someone that plays Adc/Supp and Jungle now
